column3: Traffic;Pursat:------  A bus from Capitol hit a motorcycle at 10:50 am Tuesday
column10: Pursat Province.------Traffic accident occurred after a HYUNDAI bus collided with a motorcycle
column11: causing severe injuries to the rider.------The victim
column16: was sent to a local hospital. Strawberry. ------After the incident
column17: the driver of the bus ran away.------TVFB
